title: Career Thread of The Day: Would you go Private Sector or would you go Federal Government?
body:
Sure, the private sector might pay a bit more.
But I'm really leaning towards the Federal Government due to benefits and promotions due to time, also great job security unmatched by the private sector. The government might have budget issues at the start of every year like a few years back, but it will never go broke. And if the government goes to hell so does everyone else.

If you could choose , would you go take your career to the private sector or become a federal employee?
